title: Nasus Stacks
body:
Hey guys, i'm not an extremely experianced nasus player although i love playing him, I was wondering if someone could tell me a good amount of stacks to have at 10, 20 and 30 mins in?

I normally average around 200 at 10 mins, 450 at 20 mins and 700 at 30 mins.

Thanks for your help

replies.body:
Sounds like your stacks per minute are good. What you need to keep in mind is that Nasus is pretty much a timer on the game. The longer a game goes, the more powerful his q becomes. Knowing that, you should always aim to get as many stacks as you can as early as possible. But honestly, if you're getting that many stacks it sounds like your timer is 40 minutes till god mode nasus.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Sirchez (Probably the best western Nasus player) looks to be around 400 at 20.
If i haven't reached 500 by about 22-25 minutes, then i consider the game a failure on my behalf
Your stacks should improve enormously when you reach 30-45% cdr.

100 at 10 and 300 at 20 is the minimum you should be aiming for.

400-500 at 20 is usually pretty good. Once you get 500 its pretty easy to end the game since you pretty much 3 hit towers.
